attributes.action: Halt Britain's Arms Exports to Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Halt Britain's Arms Exports to Israel and try to  persuade our EU Counterparts to do the same in view of their totally ignoring the UN Resolution asking for an immediate ceasefire in their War against Gaza. 

In 2007 GB approved £6m of Arms Exports to Israel (despite the above use in Lebanon) it licensed sales 12 times as fast, £20m in the first three months of 2008 This Trade Must Stop

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
